CustomField.description: Regular Membership donor (not Catalyst Circle) who has given a single gift of at least $500 in the last 24 months, or a recurring Sustainer payment of at least $41.67 in the last six months. Calculated nightly by Informatica process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mid-level giving circle in Regular Membership: Typically $500-$4,999 donors.
CustomField.label: Membership Leader
